recipe.name: Head First Lounge Iced Tea
recipe.description: A brisk iced tea with a bit of a kick. We serve this all day long.

preparation.step: Boil one cup of water in a pan, remove pan, and add tea. Let steep for five minutes.
Add ice to a pitcher, then add tea, then 5 cups cold water.
Mix well and serve. Give tea a quick shake in a shaker for an extra touch.
